member.name: T:LLibrary.L
member.summary: Formats and logs the given information. Use Log.Register() to register a new format and Log.This() to log something.

member.name: F:LLibrary.L.Directory
member.summary: Path of the directory of the log files.

member.name: M:LLibrary.L.CleanItself
member.summary: Sets the logger to clean itself (files older than 10 days).

member.name: M:LLibrary.L.Log(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Formats the given information and logs it. If the format doesn't exists it does nothing.
member.param: Name of the registered format to use
member.returns: True if the format exists and the logging was made, false otherwise.

member.name: M:LLibrary.L.Register(System.String)
member.summary: Register a new log format. The given format is used with string.Format, for further format info refer to it's documentation.

member.name: M:LLibrary.L.Register(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Register a new log format. The given format is used with string.Format, for further format info refer to it's documentation.

member.name: M:LLibrary.L.Unregister(System.String)
member.returns: True if the format was found and unregistered, false otherwise.
